title: American Horror
description:
Yesterday we celebrated July 4th, our Independence day. There were barbeques, fireworks and celebrations. While many gathered happily with friends and family, they were blissfully unaware of the horror stories happening all around them. Each of the 50 states has their own creepy history with curses, ghosts and murders, and here are just a few chilling tales.

First, deadly games
Followed by the scars of childhood 
Then,remember to just keep driving 
Finally in our featured story, be careful what you wish for 

If you’re 21 or older you can join millions of players around the world. Download Slotomania, the #1 FREE slots game, on the App Store or Google Play Store and get one million free coins.

You’ve earned your fun time. Go to the App Store or Google play to download Best Fiends for free.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
